entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 09:28 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this morning then to rain at times heavy near noon. Fog patches developing late this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain becoming mixed with ice pellets near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
